backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all backend types (Product, Order, Category, etc.) and business logic for an e-commerce jewellery app, including constants for cancellation windows and media limits, and imports for storage, Stripe, authorization, and HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features with associated file paths, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels, covering cart button label removal, filter panel redesign, and recently viewed section.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and recent changes, serving as a human-readable changelog/index for the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens in both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA titled 'Aurelie Fine Jewellery Mobile App' that mounts the app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component that sets up TanStack Router with all lazy-loaded page routes (including boys/girls category pages), wraps the app in QueryClient and ThemeProvider, and handles profile setup modal display after authentication.
frontend/src/components/admin/BannerMana: An admin panel component for managing scrolling banner messages, supporting add, edit, toggle enabled/disabled, delete, and reorder operations via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/BoysHeader: Admin component for managing circular category images and redirect URLs for the Boys section sub-categories in the header navigation. Supports image upload with optimization and progress tracking, and saves headers per category slug.
frontend/src/components/admin/CarouselMa: Admin component for managing up to 5 homepage carousel slides, supporting image upload/optimization, URL editing, enable/disable toggling, and slide reordering.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryCa: Admin component for managing images and redirect URLs for a specific category carousel (index 1 or 2), supporting adding, removing, reordering, and saving up to 5 images.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryIm: Admin component for managing up to 10 category images with support for uploading, removing, reordering, and setting a primary thumbnail image.
frontend/src/components/admin/HeaderCate: Admin component for managing circular category images and redirect URLs for the main header navigation row, mirroring the Boys variant but using PRODUCT_CATEGORIES.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryMan: Admin component that lists customer inquiries fetched via React Query and allows admins to submit text responses to pending inquiries with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin component that displays all orders with status badges, allows status updates via a dropdown, and supports printing individual order details in a styled pop-up window.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal dialog for creating or editing a product, handling name, description, price, category, gender, and media (image/video) uploads with optimization before submission.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Admin panel component that lists all products with edit and delete actions, using a confirmation dialog for deletion and delegating create/edit to ProductFormModal.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteConten: Admin form component for viewing and updating site-wide content fields such as contact info, social media URLs, and static text pages like terms and privacy policy.
frontend/src/components/CategoryCarousel: Auto-rotating image carousel component for a product category that fetches enabled slides, supports manual navigation arrows and dot indicators, pauses on hover, and links each slide to a redirect URL.
frontend/src/components/CategoryImageCar: A reusable image carousel component for a product category that auto-rotates slides, supports manual navigation, pauses on hover, and optionally redirects on click.
frontend/src/components/CategoryProductR: Renders a horizontally scrollable row of product cards filtered by category slug and optional gender, displaying image, name, and price.
frontend/src/components/checkout/CouponC: Checkout component that lets users enter, validate, and apply or remove a coupon code, displaying a success state with discount info when a valid code is applied.
frontend/src/components/checkout/UpiQrCo: Renders a UPI payment QR code image fetched from qrserver.com API and provides a button to copy the UPI URI to the clipboard.
frontend/src/components/CustomerPageStyl: A simple wrapper component that adds a `data-customer-page` attribute to scope customer-facing styles.
frontend/src/components/FilterIconButton: An icon button that opens a filter panel, displaying a badge with the count of active filters.
frontend/src/components/FilterPanel.tsx: A slide-in sheet panel with draft-state filter controls (metal type, price range, occasion, sort order) that applies changes only on explicit confirmation.
frontend/src/components/footer/FooterSys: Site footer component that displays the logo, contact info, policy links, and social media icons using data from the site content query.
frontend/src/components/GenderCategoryTa: Renders 'For Him' and 'For Her' navigation tabs that route to `/boys` and `/girls`, hidden on admin routes.
frontend/src/components/HeaderCategoryNa: A horizontal scrollable category navigation bar showing circular category images fetched from the backend, with optional redirect URL support per category.
frontend/src/components/HomeCarousel.tsx: A full-width home page hero carousel that auto-rotates enabled slides with directional slide transitions, manual navigation, and click-through redirect support.
frontend/src/components/HomeCategoryCaro: Renders a full-page section listing all product categories, each with two image carousels and a horizontally scrollable product row filtered to girls.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout component that renders the sticky header with navigation, search bar, auth controls, cart icon, and wraps page content with a footer and marquee banner. Handles login/logout via Internet Identity and admin route detection.
frontend/src/components/MarqueeBanner.ts: Displays a horizontally scrolling marquee banner with enabled promotional messages fetched from the backend, styled with a gold gradient background.
frontend/src/components/MasonryProductGr: Renders a masonry-style product grid with staggered entrance animations using IntersectionObserver, showing product cards with add-to-cart and buy-now actions.
frontend/src/components/NewArrivalsSecti: Displays a horizontally scrollable row of new arrival products with loading skeletons, fetched via a custom query hook, each linking to its product detail page.
frontend/src/components/OrderDetailModal: Modal dialog showing full order details including status, items, and pricing, with an optional cancellation form that lets users select a reason and submit a cancellation request.
frontend/src/components/OurStoryStrip.ts: A full-width decorative brand story section with a background image, animated text reveal on scroll via IntersectionObserver, and a call-to-action button linking to the contact page.
frontend/src/components/ProductFilterBar: A filter bar component for products that provides dropdowns for metal type, price range, occasion, and sort order, along with active filter count badge and a clear-all button.
frontend/src/components/ProductMediaCaro: A carousel component for product media that displays video (first) and images in a square aspect ratio with navigation arrows and dot indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects new user profile information (name, email, phone, address) and saves it via the actor, granting admin access if a specific email is used.
frontend/src/components/RecentlyViewedSe: A horizontally scrollable section that displays recently viewed products fetched from local state and the product list, with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/RouteLoadingFall: A skeleton placeholder layout shown while lazy-loaded route components are being fetched, displaying header and grid card skeletons.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: A full-screen splash screen that shows the Aurelie logo and brand name with a zoom animation, then calls onComplete after 1.5 seconds.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: An empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUiBodyAttribu: Hook that sets a `data-admin-ui` attribute on `document.body` while an admin route is mounted, enabling scoped CSS for Radix UI portals.
frontend/src/hooks/useBannerQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting banner messages via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store with persistence for managing a shopping cart, including add, remove, update quantity, clear, and total calculation operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategoryCarouselQu: React Query hooks for fetching and updating category carousel images and redirect URLs via the backend actor.
React Query hooks for fetching all category headers or a single category header, and a mutation hook for setting a category header via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFooterVariant.ts: Simple hook that always returns the `'split'` footer variant with no state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductFilters.ts: Custom React hook that filters and sorts a list of products by metal type, price range, and occasion, and tracks the count of active filters.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including products, orders, inquiries, categories, carousel slides, user profiles, and admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentlyViewed.ts: Custom hook that persists and manages a list of recently viewed product IDs (up to 10) in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind directives, defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the Aurelie brand color system, and adds utility classes and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin page for viewing and managing orders with filtering by date range and month/year, order status updates, and detailed order display including product names and cancellation reasons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/CategoryEditPag: Admin page for editing an existing category's name, description, display order, and images, with access control and navigation back to the admin dashboard on save.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page that displays stats (products, orders, inquiries) and provides tabbed management interfaces for products, orders, inquiries, site content, carousels, and categories, gated behind an admin check.
frontend/src/pages/BoysHomePage.tsx: Homepage for the men's jewellery section that displays animated category circles fetched from category headers, navigating to subcategory pages or custom redirect URLs on click.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart with item list, quantity controls, and remove buttons, requiring authentication. Shows empty/login states and formats prices in INR.
frontend/src/pages/categories/AnkletsPag: Category page for Anklets, rendering the shared CategoryPageTemplate with the 'anklets' slug and relevant title/description.
frontend/src/pages/categories/boys/BoysB: Category page for Boys Bracelets, rendering CategoryPageTemplate with the 'boys-bracelet' slug and a 'boys' gender filter.
frontend/src/pages/categories/boys/BoysC: Category page for Boys Chains, rendering CategoryPageTemplate with the 'boys-chains' slug and a 'boys' gender filter.
frontend/src/pages/categories/boys/BoysL: Category page for Boys Lab Diamonds, rendering CategoryPageTemplate with the 'boys-lab-diamonds' slug and a 'boys' gender filter.
frontend/src/pages/categories/boys/BoysR: Category page for Boys Rings, rendering CategoryPageTemplate with the 'boys-rings' slug and a 'boys' gender filter.
frontend/src/pages/categories/BridalJewe: Category page for Bridal Jewellery, rendering the shared CategoryPageTemplate with the 'bridal-jewellery' slug and relevant title/description.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryNo: Empty file with no content, likely a placeholder for a category-not-found page.
frontend/src/pages/categories/CategoryPa: Reusable template for category product listing pages that filters products by category slug and optional gender, applies live filters/sorting, and supports add-to-cart and buy-now actions.
frontend/src/pages/categories/EarringsPa: Category page for Earrings, rendering the shared CategoryPageTemplate with the 'earrings' slug and relevant title/description.
frontend/src/pages/categories/LabGrownDi: Category page for Lab Grown Diamonds Jewellery, rendering the shared CategoryPageTemplate with the 'lab-diamonds-jewellery' slug and relevant title/description.
frontend/src/pages/categories/NecklacePa: Category page for Necklaces, rendering the shared CategoryPageTemplate with the 'necklace' slug and relevant title/description.
Category page for Rings, rendering the shared CategoryPageTemplate with the 'rings' slug and relevant title/description.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Multi-step checkout page handling shipping address entry, coupon application, and UPI payment submission to create an order. Computes discounted totals and generates UPI URIs for payment.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page that allows authenticated users to submit customer inquiries with name, email, and message fields via the submitInquiry mutation.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboardPage: Customer dashboard showing tabbed views of the user's orders and inquiries with status badges, loading skeletons, and an order detail modal.
frontend/src/pages/GirlsHomePage.tsx: Landing page for the women's jewellery section featuring animated category circles fetched from category headers and a hero banner with navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main homepage composing the hero carousel, new arrivals, category carousels, and recently viewed sections into a single layout.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays a customer's order history with status badges, order details, and product names, supporting click-through to an OrderDetailModal for full order information.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with buttons to return to the cart or navigate back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays a payment success confirmation with next-steps information and navigation buttons to view orders or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Fetches and renders the site's privacy policy text from backend content, showing a loading spinner while data is retrieved.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCategoryPage.t: Renders a filtered product grid for a given category slug, with add-to-cart, buy-now, and view-details actions, validating the slug against known categories.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows full details for a single product including a media carousel, price, quantity selector, and add-to-cart/buy-now buttons, while tracking the product as recently viewed.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileDetailsPage.ts: Provides a form for authenticated users to view and edit their profile information (name, email, phone, address, DOB), with validation and save functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ShippingPolicyPage.ts: Fetches and renders the site's shipping policy text from backend content, showing a loading spinner while data is retrieved.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditionsPage.t: Displays the Terms & Conditions page by fetching site content via a query hook and rendering the termsOfService field, with a loading spinner while data is fetched.
frontend/src/utils/device.ts: Utility function to detect if the user is on a mobile device using the modern navigator.userAgentData API with a user-agent string fallback.
frontend/src/utils/mediaOptimization.ts: Client-side utilities to resize and compress images using a canvas before upload, with parallel multi-image support and a passthrough stub for video optimization.
frontend/src/utils/pricing.ts: Centralized pricing utilities for cart checkout, including subtotal calculation, coupon validation (AFJ10 for 10% off), discount computation, and INR formatting.
frontend/src/utils/productCategories.ts: Defines product category data and utility functions for both girls and boys jewellery categories, including slug-based lookup, validation, and option-list generators.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Provides utility functions for generating UPI payment deep links (standard UPI, Google Pay, PhonePe) for Aurelie Fine Jewellery with a fixed payee VPA.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence helpers for sensitive values like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom color palettes (gold, navy, silver, etc.), border radius, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state for the Aurelie Fine Jewellery app, documenting four in-progress UI features: removing cart button labels, filter icon navigation, recently viewed section, and shimmer border on product cards.
